args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ. Prove that |csc z| ≥ |csc (Re z)|. Translate to Lean4: state a theorem that for z : Complex, Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin z) ≥ Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin z.re). End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry. Import Mathlib at the top and open Complex.

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set Filter
open scoped Real

/-- Let z \in \mathbb{C}. Prove that |\csc z| \geq |\csc (\Re z)|. Save it to: jirilebl_ca_ca_15018.lean -/
theorem csc_le_csc_re_extracted (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.csc z) ≥ Complex.abs (Complex.csc ↑z.re) := by sorry

args.query: mathlib4 Complex.csc csc complex cosecant name Mathlib Complex.csc sin inv? "csc" Mathlib4 complex trig csc

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Prove that |csc z| ≥ |csc (Re z)|. -/
theorem csc_le_csc_re_extracted (z : ℂ) :
  Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin z) ≥ Complex.abs (1 / Complex.sin (z.re : ℂ)) := by sorry
